name: Cairn (atgeorge)
description:
This game is a submission for LowrezJam 2022 Game Jam where participants had to create a game with 64x64 resolution or less.  Find this game's submission page here:

https://itch.io/jam/lowrezjam-2022/rate/1662683

THIS IS A WORK IN PROGRESS!

This is currently less of a game and more of a technical demonstration, but I am excited to continue working on it!

The grand idea is that you are trying to collect rocks to build cairns (rock towers traditionally used as path markers in human history) which, when linked, open a portal to a new level - all while fighting off enemies and managing stamina.  The player gets heavier as they collect rocks, which is reflected in the movement physics.

Controls:

Gamepad and Mouse + Keyboard Compatible!

Move: Left Stick/D-Pad; WS/Up Down Arrows

Attack: Square/X; Spacebar
